title: Ticket #4629: Drmaa library breaks when SCHEDD_HOST is used
description: The HTCondor DRMAA library uses the hostname of the local machine in the job ids that it returns to the user. When these job ids are used subsequently, the library uses the hostname with the -name parameter of the HTCondor command line tools. The -name parameter is not used with condor_submit. For most configurations of HTCondor, this will work fine, as the local schedd's name is the machine's hostname. But if SCHEDD_HOST is set, then jobs will be submitted to the schedd named by SCHEDD_HOST, but condor_q and friends will attempt to talk to a different, possibly non-existent, schedd.
